name:
United
 Parcel
 Service
description: I work on the New Rating Framework (NRF) team to create new and convert existing APIs to RESTful APIs for external client usage in C#. In doing so, I also had to maintain the existing APIs to match the new features of the RESTful APIs.

name:
Cloudstream
 Medical
 Imaging
 Inc.
description: I implemented code that would clarify the image quality of ultrasound imaging like blurring and sharpening edges of an image and creating a v-wave imaging algorithm for image clarity. I also added more viewing options to the post-processed images.
I created test cases to check if there were bugs and would fixing any that popped up. I also helped refine the code from open source to fit the functionalities we needed.

name:
San
 Diego
 Supercomputer
 Center
description: I taught middle/high school teachers and students the role computing plays in a teaching environment with Python. We helped them program games like Thai21 and Tower of Hanoi. I also helped with office hours: debugging participants' code and clarifying misunderstood topics. Toward the end of the internship, I volunteered to be the speaker for our program to present what we have accomplished to the San Diego Supercomputer Center board members.
